```python missing_env_vars.py
import os


def run():
    required_vars = ["API_KEY", "WEBHOOK_URL"]

    missing = [var for var in required_vars if not os.getenv(var)]

    if missing:
        return {"error": f"Missing environment variables: {', '.join(missing)}"}

    # Continue with automation
```
